passive_1: If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs [110 – 280|82.5 – 210] (based on level) magic damage for 2.5 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs [110 – 280|82.5 – 210] (based on level) magic damage for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 110 – 280 (based on level) magic damage for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.

If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 110 – 280 (based on level) magic damage for 5 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 250 magic damage for 5 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 250 magic damage for 3 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 300 magic damage for 4 seconds. 60 second cooldown.
If you would take magic damage which would leave you at less than 30% of your maximum health, you gain a shield which absorbs 300 magic damage for 4 seconds. 45 second cooldown.
